function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Missing data on alcohol consumption, smoking, and nutrition could lead to unadjusted factors and potential mediators in the analysis.","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of the effects of flourishing on healthcare costs, potential bias in the results.","Mitigation":"Collect and incorporate data on alcohol consumption, smoking, and nutrition in the analysis to adjust for these factors.","Technologies":"Data collection tools for capturing information on alcohol consumption, smoking, and nutrition.","People":"Data scientists, researchers, and analysts responsible for collecting and analyzing the dataset.","Owner":"Research team, data collection team."},{"Description":"Flourishing assessment based on a specific conceptualization of flourishing, potentially excluding other important components such as character and virtue.","Impact":"Limited understanding of the comprehensive effects of flourishing on healthcare costs, potential for biased results.","Mitigation":"Explore and incorporate alternative conceptualizations of flourishing that include character and virtue components in the assessment.","Technologies":"Psychological assessment tools that incorporate character and virtue components of flourishing.","People":"Research team, psychologists, and experts in flourishing assessment.","Owner":"Research team, psychologists."},{"Description":"Possible overadjustment in the analytical models by accounting for past healthcare utilization and health status, leading to biased results.","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the effects of flourishing on healthcare costs, potential for skewed outcomes.","Mitigation":"Conduct sensitivity analysis by comparing models with and without the adjustment for health factors to assess the impact of overadjustment.","Technologies":"Statistical modeling software, sensitivity analysis tools.","People":"Statisticians, data analysts, researchers.","Owner":"Research team, data analysis team."}]}
